setting.name: rqc_journal_id
setting.description: The journal ID as generated by RQC. An integer that is supplied when you register a journal at RQC. This value is public.

setting.name: rqc_journal_api_key
setting.description: The journal API key as generated by RQC. An alphanumeric string created by RQC upon request. This value is secret and is used for authentication.

setting.name: rqc_journal_salt
setting.description: The journal's salt value that is used for anonymising e-mail addresses. WARNING: This value should not be changed!
